--[[ 테레시스 --]]
function NPC_604001:Init(NPCID) NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2);
NPC_604001.LimitForBreakParts = NPC_604001.MaxHP/15
NPC_604001.TalIdSpiltWeb = 210700707 NPC_604001.TalIdAroundWeb1 = 210700713 NPC_604001.TalIdAroundWeb2 = 210700714 NPC_604001.TalIdPain1 = 210700712 NPC_604001.TalIdRoar = 210700708 NPC_604001.TalIdHeal = 210700706 NPC_604001.TalIdJump = 210700703 NPC_604001.TalIdWhirl = 210700704
NPC_604001.PartIdJawL = 3 NPC_604001.PartIdJawR = 4 end
function NPC_604001:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_604001:OnYell(RequestNPC, TargetActor) this:Assist(RequestNPC) end
function NPC_604001:Healing(ThisNPC, Opponent) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_604001.TalIdHeal ) then return end
if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() == 1 then return end
if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_604001.PartIdJawL ) and ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_604001.PartIdJawR ) then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_604001.TalIdHeal ) end
-- Talent Callback Func function NPC_604001:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
--- function NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, bFrontPart) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) local hpRate = ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()
local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() if currentTalent == NPC_604001.TalIdPain1 or currentTalent == NPC_604001.TalIdRoar then return HitInfo end
if (bFrontPart == true and (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) == false or ThisNPC:CheckBPart(4) == false)) then -- 전면 누적치 local frontDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage
if (frontDamage >= NPC_604001.LimitForBreakParts) then if (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_604001.TalIdPain1 ) frontDamage = 0 elseif (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(4) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(4, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_604001.TalIdPain1) frontDamage = 0 end end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, frontDamage) else -- 후면 누적치 local rearDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) + HitInfo.Damage if rearDamage >= NPC_604001.LimitForBreakParts and (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == false or ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == false) then if (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_604001.TalIdPain1) rearDamage = 0 elseif(ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_604001.TalIdPain1) rearDamage = 0 end end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, rearDamage) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_604001:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) return NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_604001:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_604001:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_604001:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_604001:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_604001:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, false) end
-- NPC107007_Stressed function NPC_604001:Stressed(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:Aggro("short", 0)
local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) if Dist < 400 and not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_604001.TalIdWhirl ) then
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_604001.TalIdWhirl ) end end
